raw: Sister Patricia McGowan, Dedicated Teacher, Dies at 80 .

raw: Sister Patricia McGowan ’s teaching style was distinct : She had the ability to be stern without ever losing empathy .
replaced: Sister McGowan ’s teaching style was distinct : Sister McGowan had the ability to be stern without ever losing empathy .

raw: Sister Patsy , as her students called her , was known for the phrase “ Deal with it , ” but it was uttered without harshness and with a note of understanding .
replaced: Sister McGowan , as Sister McGowan students called Sister McGowan , was known for the phrase “ Deal with it , ” but the phrase “ Deal with it was uttered without harshness and with a note of understanding .

raw: “ She was tough but good , ” her niece Dr. Amy Fenwick , a trauma physician , said .
replaced: “ Sister McGowan was tough but good , ” Sister McGowan  Dr. Fenwick said .

raw: Sister McGowan , whose 60 - year teaching career ranged from elementary school grade to the college level , died on April 19 at St. John ’s Riverside Hospital in Yonkers , N.Y.
replaced: Sister McGowan died on April 19 at St. John ’s Riverside Hospital in Yonkers , N.Y.

raw: The cause was complications of Covid-19 , Dr. Fenwick said .
replaced: The cause was complications of Covid-19 , Dr. Fenwick said .

raw: Sister McGowan joined the Sisters of Charity of New York at 17 and began her teaching career in 1959 at St. Brigid ’s elementary school in Manhattan , where she taught fourth - graders .
replaced: Sister McGowan joined the Sisters of Charity of New York at 17 and began Sister McGowan teaching career in 1959 at St. Brigid ’s elementary school in Manhattan , where Sister McGowan taught fourth - graders .

raw: She later taught journalism and communications at the College of Mount Saint Vincent in the Bronx , her alma mater , where she lived in faculty housing .
replaced: Sister McGowan later taught journalism and communications at the College of Mount Saint Vincent in the Bronx , Sister McGowan alma mater , where Sister McGowan lived in faculty housing .

raw: As the years went by and the number of students she crossed paths with increased , Sister McGowan remained particularly good at remembering their names , as well as the names of their siblings , many of whom she had also taught .
replaced: As the years went by and the number of students  Sister McGowan crossed paths with increased , Sister McGowan remained particularly good at remembering students names , as well as the names of students siblings , many of whom Sister McGowan had also taught .

raw: And many of her former students stayed in touch .
replaced: And many of Sister McGowan former students stayed in touch .

raw: One was a nurse at the hospital where she died and was with her at the end .
replaced: One was a nurse at the hospital where Sister McGowan died and was with Sister McGowan at the end .

raw: Patricia Elizabeth McGowan was born on June 5 , 1939 , in Manhattan , the youngest of four children of Cormac and Anna McGowan .
replaced: Sister McGowan was born on June 5 , 1939 , in Manhattan , the youngest of four children of Cormac and Anna McGowan .

raw: Her father , an Irish immigrant , worked in the insurance business and managed a bar .
replaced: Sister McGowan father , an Irish immigrant , worked in the insurance business and managed a bar .

raw: She attended Cathedral High School in Manhattan and , after graduating from Mount Saint Vincent , earned a master ’s degree in education from Hunter College in Manhattan , a master ’s in journalism from New York University and a doctorate in higher and adult education from Columbia University ’s Teachers College .
replaced: Sister McGowan attended Cathedral High School in Manhattan and , after graduating from Mount Saint Vincent , earned a master ’s degree in education from Hunter College in Manhattan , a master ’s in journalism from New York University and a doctorate in higher and adult education from Columbia University ’s Teachers College .

raw: Mount Saint Vincent asked Sister McGowan to return as a journalism professor in 1981 , and she went on to teach there full time for 28 years , nine of them as chairwoman of its communications department .
replaced: Mount Saint Vincent asked Sister McGowan to return as a journalism professor in 1981 , and Sister McGowan went on to teach there full time for 28 years , nine of them as chairwoman of Mount Saint Vincent communications department .

raw: She became a part - time instructor in 2009 and retired in 2019 .
replaced: Sister McGowan became a part - time instructor in 2009 and retired in 2019 .

raw: She is survived by her sister Nancy Kavanaugh .
replaced: Sister McGowan is survived by Sister McGowan sister Nancy Kavanaugh .

raw: Sister McGowan was known for a quick sense of humor .
replaced: Sister McGowan was known for a quick sense of humor .

raw: On one occasion a police officer yelled at her for jaywalking in the Battery Park area .
replaced: On one occasion a police officer yelled at Sister McGowan for jaywalking in the Battery Park area .

raw: Wearing everyday clothes , she yelled back , “ Do n’t you have anything better to do than to yell at a nun ? ”
replaced: Wearing everyday clothes , Sister McGowan yelled back , “ Do n’t Sister McGowan have anything better to do than to yell at a nun ? ”

raw: Her knowledge of New York was encyclopedic .
replaced: Sister McGowan knowledge of New York was encyclopedic .

raw: Everywhere she went , she had a memory or a fact to share about the city .
replaced: Everywhere Sister McGowan went , Sister McGowan had a memory or a fact to share about New York .

raw: When not teaching she painted in water colors and could devour 10 books a week .
replaced: When not teaching Sister McGowan painted in water colors and could devour 10 books a week .

raw: When one of her brothers died of cancer at 46 , her relationship with his four children , all under 18 , strengthened .
replaced: When one of her brothers  Sister McGowan brothers died of cancer at 46 , Sister McGowan relationship with one of her brothers  them , strengthened .

raw: She became an essential part of their lives .
replaced: Sister McGowan became an essential part of them lives .

raw: When they went off to college , she visited them regularly .

raw: “ She was part of the glue that kept everybody together , ” Dr. Fenwick said .
